title: "Darius got a penta omg so OP"

replies.body: I mean, in the video you posted they were massively ahead in gold and winning. Darius was massively behind in gold and tanked a bunch of ults and still pentad and made it look easy.
Seeing an ADC getting a pentakill is nothing new really.

I think the point being made here is that somehow Darius is OP for getting a penta, when a Trist is capable of literally hoping down the entire lane in the process to get a penta, which is somewhat absurd.
You people seem to be missing the point that literally no other ADC could have pulled that off, because no other ADC has a gapcloser that large with a reset.

they lost the teamfight, they couldnt fight back since they were going to get aced, trist just did what any adc does.


this doesn't mean that she's op.

and by the way, did u just really compare darius and TRIS???
